overview: Sexually frustrated housewife Betty isn't getting the carnal fulfillment she needs and desires from her neglectful football addict husband. Betty decides to rectify the situation by going out with her rowdy gal pals Irene and Angie to a swinging nightclub where bawdy fun and fornication are the order of the day.
tagline: It's Where Women Go Wild!!Ladies Night: Where the Ladies Have a Super Ball of Their Own.
title: Ladies Night
